Customer Service NextGen

Customer Service NextGen is used in all call center activities such as searching items, capturing orders, and returning/exchanging items. 

Note: It is recommended to use the Angular JS user interface with the permission: customerengagementfacade::

Using the Customer Service NextGen Home page, you can search by customer, item or the order number.  

Search by Customer 

  1. In the Find a Customer icon text box, enter the name of the customer, phone number, or e-mail of the customer and search for a customer. 

  2. Click View More Search Options to use the first name, last name, email, and phone number of the customer to perform the search. 

Based on the search criteria, the customer list is displayed. 

  1. Select a customer from the customer list to display the Customer Transaction page.

Search by Item

In the Find an Item icon text box, enter the item name, item ID, style, or color of an item and search for the item. 
The Item search page is displayed.

Search by Order Number

In the  Find an Order text box, enter the order number and search for an order. The Call Center page is displayed to view the order details. 

The navigation bar on the Customer Service NextGen Home page contains the following icons to navigate through the various interfaces for managing the customer orders:

  • Item Search
  • Orders
